long_description: A great starter for recreational boaters, this kit provides the basics-paddle float with tether, bilge pump and safety whistle-all in a mesh drawstring bag. Dual-chambered paddle float maximizes buoyancy with an extra-large capacity. Quick-release buckles easily attach paddle float to kayak paddle, and shockcord, clip-on safety tether eliminates loss in windy conditions. Bilge pump features an easy-grip handle, strong shaft and heavy-duty impact-resistant plastic construction; can pump 8 gal. per min. Loud plastic emergency whistle lets you be heard at great distances; whistle features a handy clip.
short_description: A great starter for recreational boaters, this kit provides the basics-paddle float with tether, bilge pump and safety whistle-all in a mesh drawstring bag.
